name: Iris (Emma Lanteri Devriendt, Marco Lagiongada, Aro)
name_original: Iris (Emma Lanteri Devriendt, Marco Lagiongada, Aro)
description:
The game follows the story of a girl named Maya who is inside I.R.I.S. (Intergalactic Realm - Intermediate System), an artificial solar system far from any other star. Discover the mysteries of the fall of the protagonist's house ring, while an escape from the emptiness of the cosmos becomes more and more real.

Concept Design: Aurora Del Giudice, Marco Lagiongada, Emma Lanteri

First Chapter: Marco Lagiongada

Second Chapter: Emma Lanteri

Third Chapter: Aurora Del Giudice
